title: Education
description: My academic background provides a strong foundation for a career in engineering, with a Master's focus on Microsystems, Materials, and Devices. My curriculum has included advanced courses in Power Electronics, VLSI Design, Computer Architecture, Solid State Devices, and Digital Signal Processing. This comprehensive study has prepared me to tackle complex technical challenges and contribute to impactful projects in both research and industry.

items.degree: Master of Science in Electrical and Computer Engineering
items.coursework: Electronic materials, computer architecture, VLSI Design, Solid state devices

items.degree: Bachelor of Electrical and Electronics Engineering
items.description: Strong foundation with microprocessors, power electronics, embedded systems and semi conductors
